9 class ConfigError(Exception):
10  """
11  Exception called when sensor is configured incorrectly
12  """
13 
14  def __init__(self, allowed_values):
15  description = "Not a valid config. Value must be in %s" % allowed_values
16  super().__init__(description)
17 
18 
19 class Sensor:
20 
21  @abstractmethod
22  def startup():
23  pass
24 
25  @abstractmethod
26  def get_raw_data():
27  pass
28 
29  @staticmethod
30  def get_value(low, high):
31  """
32  Converting bit value of two 8-bit registers to one
33  """
34  value = (high << 8) | low
35 
36  if (value > 32768):
37  value = value - 65536
38  return value
39

41 class Magnetometer(Sensor):
42 
43  def __init__(self):
44  self._mx = 0
45  self._my = 0
46  self._mz = 0
47  self._magnetometer_range = 0
48 
49  def setM(self, mx, my, mz):
50  self._mx = mx
51  self._my = my
52  self._mz = mz
53 
54  def set_magnetometer_range(self, sensor_range):
55  self._magnetometer_range = sensor_range
56 
57  def getM(self):
58  return self._mx, self._my, self._mz
59 
60  def get_magnetometer_range(self):
61  return self._magnetometer_range

121 class MPU6050(Accelerometer, Gyroscope):
122  PWR_M = 0x6B
123  DIV = 0x19
124  CONFIG = 0x1A
125  GYRO_CONFIG = 0x1B
126  ACCEL_CONFIG = 0x1C
127  INT_EN = 0x38
128  ACCEL_XOUT_H = 0x3B
129  ACCEL_XOUT_L = 0x3C
130  ACCEL_YOUT_H = 0x3D
131  ACCEL_YOUT_L = 0x3E
132  ACCEL_ZOUT_H = 0x3F
133  ACCEL_ZOUT_L = 0x40
134  TEMP_OUT_H = 0x41
135  TEMP_OUT_L = 0x42
136  GYRO_XOUT_H = 0x43
137  GYRO_XOUT_L = 0x44
138  GYRO_YOUT_H = 0x45
139  GYRO_YOUT_L = 0x46
140  GYRO_ZOUT_H = 0x47
141  GYRO_ZOUT_L = 0x48
142 
143  ACCEL_RANGE_2G = 0x00
144  ACCEL_RANGE_4G = 0x08
145  ACCEL_RANGE_8G = 0x10
146  ACCEL_RANGE_16G = 0x18
147 
148  GYRO_RANGE_250DEG = 0x00
149  GYRO_RANGE_500DEG = 0x08
150  GYRO_RANGE_1000DEG = 0x10
151  GYRO_RANGE_2000DEG = 0x18
152 
153  MPU6050_ADDR = 0x68
154 
155  def __init__(self, bus, accel_range=2, gyro_range=250):
156 
157  allowed_accel_range = (2, 4, 8, 16)
158  allowed_gyro_range = (250, 500, 1000, 2000)
159 
160  if accel_range not in allowed_accel_range:
161  raise ConfigError(allowed_accel_range)
162  if gyro_range not in allowed_gyro_range:
163  raise ConfigError(allowed_gyro_range)
164 
165  if accel_range == 2:
166  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_2G
167  elif accel_range == 4:
168  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_4G
169  elif accel_range == 8:
170  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_8G
171  elif accel_range == 16:
172  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_16G
173 
174  if gyro_range == 250:
175  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_250DEG
176  elif accel_range == 500:
177  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_500DEG
178  elif accel_range == 1000:
179  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_1000DEG
180  elif accel_range == 2000:
181  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_2000DEG
182 
183  self.bus = bus
184  self.set_accelerometer_range(float(accel_range))
185  self.set_gyroscope_range(float(gyro_range))
186 
187  def startup(self):
188  """
189  Configuring Sensor with writing values to configure registers
190  """
191  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.DIV, 7)
192  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.PWR_M, 1)
193  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.CONFIG, 0)
194  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.GYRO_CONFIG, self.gyro_config)
195  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.ACCEL_CONFIG, self.accel_config)
196  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.INT_EN, 1)
197  rospy.sleep(1)
198 
199  def read_status(self):
200  """
201  Read status register of sensor
202  """
203  return self.bus.read_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.REG_STATUS)
204 
205  def get_raw_data(self, calibrated=False):
206  """
207  reading data registers with values which provided by sensor
208  param calibrated: if flag is on, apply calibration params to calculate values
209  return:
210  ax, ay, az - the projections of the gravity vector onto the axis x, y, z
211  gx, gy, gz - angles of rotation about the axis x, y, z
212  """
213  buf = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.ACCEL_XOUT_H, 14)
214  ax = self.get_value(buf[1], buf[0])
215  ay = self.get_value(buf[3], buf[2])
216  az = self.get_value(buf[5], buf[4])
217 
218  gx = self.get_value(buf[9], buf[8])
219  gy = self.get_value(buf[11], buf[10])
220  gz = self.get_value(buf[13], buf[12])
221 
222  self.setA(ax, ay, az)
223  self.setG(gx, gy, gz)
224 
225  return ax, ay, az, gx, gy, gz

228 class QMC5883(Magnetometer):
229  XOUT_LSB = 0x00
230  XOUT_MSB = 0x01
231  YOUT_LSB = 0x02
232  YOUT_MSB = 0x03
233  ZOUT_LSB = 0x04
234  ZOUT_MSB = 0x05
235  REG_STATUS = 0x06
236  TOUT_LSB = 0x07
237  TOUT_MSB = 0x08
238  REG_CONTROL_1 = 0x09
239  REG_CONTROL_2 = 0x0A
240  REG_PERIOD = 0x0B
241  ADDRESS = 0x0D
242 
243  # Oversampling values for the CONFIG register
244  CONFIG_OS512 = 0b00000000
245  CONFIG_OS256 = 0b01000000
246  CONFIG_OS128 = 0b10000000
247  CONFIG_OS64 = 0b11000000
248 
249  # Range values for the CONFIG register
250  CONFIG_2GAUSS = 0b00000000
251  CONFIG_8GAUSS = 0b00010000
252 
253  # Rate values for the CONFIG register
254  CONFIG_10HZ = 0b00000000
255  CONFIG_50HZ = 0b00000100
256  CONFIG_100HZ = 0b00001000
257  CONFIG_200HZ = 0b00001100
258 
259  # Mode values for the CONFIG register
260  CONFIG_STANDBY = 0b00000000
261  CONFIG_CONT = 0b00000001
262 
263  # Mode values for the CONFIG2 register
264  CONFIG2_INT_DISABLE = 0b00000001
265  CONFIG2_ROL_PTR = 0b01000000
266  CONFIG2_SOFT_RST = 0b10000000
267 
268  # INI_FILE = Path(__file__).resolve().parent / 'settings' / 'QMC5883.ini'
269 
270  def __init__(self, bus, oversampling=512, range=2, rate=100, mode=1):
271 
272  allowed_oversampling = (512, 256, 128, 64)
273  allowed_range = (2, 8)
274  allowed_rate = (10, 50, 100, 200)
275  allowed_mode = (0, 1)
276 
277  if oversampling not in allowed_oversampling:
278  raise ConfigError(allowed_oversampling)
279  if range not in allowed_range:
280  raise ConfigError(allowed_range)
281  if rate not in allowed_rate:
282  raise ConfigError(allowed_rate)
283  if mode not in allowed_mode:
284  raise ConfigError(allowed_mode)
285 
286  if oversampling == 512:
287  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS512
288  elif oversampling == 256:
289  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS256
290  elif oversampling == 128:
291  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS128
292  elif oversampling == 64:
293  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS64
294 
295  if range == 2:
296  self.range_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_2GAUSS
297  elif range == 8:
298  self.range_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_8GAUSS
299 
300  if rate == 10:
301  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_10HZ
302  elif rate == 50:
303  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_50HZ
304  elif rate == 100:
305  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_100HZ
306  elif rate == 200:
307  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_200HZ
308 
309  if mode == 0:
310  self.mode_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_STANDBY
311  elif mode == 1:
312  self.mode_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_CONT
313 
314  self.oversampling = oversampling
315  self.range = range
316  self.rate = rate
317  self.mode = mode
318 
319  self.bus = bus
320  self.set_magnetometer_range(float(range))
321 
322  def startup(self):
323  """
324  Configuring Sensor with writing values to configure registers
325  """
326  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_CONTROL_1,
327  self.oversampling_config | self.range_config | self.rate_config | self.mode_config)
328  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_CONTROL_2, QMC5883.CONFIG2_ROL_PTR)
329  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_PERIOD, 0x01)
330  rospy.sleep(1)
331 
332  def read_status(self):
333  """
334  Read status register of sensor
335  """
336  return self.bus.read_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, self.REG_STATUS)
337 
338  def get_raw_data(self):
339  """
340  reading data registers with values which provided by sensor
341  param calibrated: if flag is on, apply calibration params to calculate values
342  return:
343  x, y, z - the projections of the magnetic vector onto the axis x, y, z
344  """
345  buf = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, self.XOUT_LSB, 6)
346  x = Sensor.get_value(buf[0], buf[1])
347  y = Sensor.get_value(buf[2], buf[3])
348  z = Sensor.get_value(buf[4], buf[5])
349 
350  self.setM(x, y, z)
351 
352  return x, y, z

356 class InertialNavigationSystem:
357 
358  def __init__(self):
359  self.sensors = {}
360 
361  self._ax = 0
362  self._ay = 0
363  self._az = 0
364  self._gx = 0
365  self._gy = 0
366  self._gz = 0
367  self._mx = 0
368  self._my = 0
369  self._mz = 0
370 
371  self.roll = 0
372  self.pitch = 0
373  self.yaw = 0
374  self.vx = 0
375  self.vy = 0
376  self.vz = 0
377  self.xpos = 0
378  self.ypos = 0
379  self.depth = 0
380 
381  self.config_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.dirname(__file__)), 'config/calibration.yaml')
382 
383 
384  def startup_sensors(self, sensors):
385  for sensor in sensors:
386  if isinstance(sensor, Accelerometer):
387  self.sensors['accelerometer'] = sensor
388  if isinstance(sensor, Gyroscope):
389  self.sensors['gyroscope'] = sensor
390  if isinstance(sensor, Magnetometer):
391  self.sensors['magnetometer'] = sensor
392  sensor.startup()
393  if not self.sensors['accelerometer'] or not self.sensors['gyroscope']:
394  raise NotImplementedError
395  if not self.sensors['magnetometer']:
396  raise Warning
397 
398  def set_real_sensor_values(self):
399  """
400  convert raw binary sensor values into decimal unit system
401  """
402 
403  def convert(data, sensor_range):
404  for index in range(len(data)):
405  data[index] = data[index] / 32768.0 * sensor_range
406  return data
407 
408  sensors = set(val for val in self.sensors.values())
409  for sensor in sensors:
410  sensor.get_raw_data()
411  ax, ay, az = self.sensors['accelerometer'].getA()
412  gx, gy, gz = self.sensors['gyroscope'].getG()
413  mx, my, mz = self.sensors['magnetometer'].getM()
414  self._ax, self._ay, self._az = convert([ax, ay, az], self.sensors['accelerometer'].get_accelerometer_range())
415  self._gx, self._gy, self._gz = convert([gx, gy, gz], self.sensors['gyroscope'].get_gyroscope_range())
416  self._mx, self._my, self._mz = convert([mx, my, mz], self.sensors['magnetometer'].get_magnetometer_range())
417 
418  def get_v(self):
419  return self._ax, self._ay, self._az, self._gx, self._gy, self._gz
420 
421  def __calibrate_magnetometer(self, rounds):
422  """
423  Magnetometer calibration
424  rounds: number of read cycles
425  """
426  xmin, ymin, zmin = 32767, 32767, 32767
427  xmax, ymax, zmax = -32768, -32768, -32768
428  print("Rotate compass")
429  rospy.sleep(4)
430  for _ in range(rounds):
431  self.set_real_sensor_values()
432  self._mx, self._my, self._mz = -self._mx, -self._my, -self._mz
433  print(self._mx, self._my, self._mz)
434 
435  xmin = min(xmin, self._mx)
436  ymin = min(ymin, self._my)
437  zmin = min(zmin, self._mz)
438 
439  xmax = max(xmax, self._mx)
440  ymax = max(ymax, self._my)
441  zmax = max(zmax, self._mz)
442  rospy.sleep(0.05)
443 
444  x_offset = (xmax + xmin) / 2
445  y_offset = (ymax + ymin) / 2
446  z_offset = (zmax + zmin) / 2
447 
448  chord_x = (xmax - xmin) / 2.0
449  chord_y = (ymax - ymin) / 2.0
450  chord_z = (zmax - zmin) / 2.0
451 
452  chord_average = (chord_x + chord_y + chord_z) / 3.0
453 
454  x_scale = chord_average / chord_x
455  y_scale = chord_average / chord_y
456  z_scale = chord_average / chord_z
457 
458  with open(self.config_path, 'r') as f:
459  conf = yaml.safe_load(f)
460 
461  conf["Magnetometer"]["mxoffset"] = x_offset
462  conf["Magnetometer"]["myoffset"] = y_offset
463  conf["Magnetometer"]["mzoffset"] = z_offset
464  conf["Magnetometer"]["mxscale"] = x_scale
465  conf["Magnetometer"]["myscale"] = y_scale
466  conf["Magnetometer"]["mzscale"] = z_scale
467 
468  with open(self.config_path, 'w') as f:
469  yaml.dump(conf, f, default_flow_style=False)
470 
471  def __calibrate_gyroscope_and_accelerometer(self, rounds):
472  """
473  Gyroscope and accelerometer calibration
474  rounds: number of read cycles
475  """
476  gxcal, gycal, gzcal = 0, 0, 0
477  axcal, aycal, azcal = 0, 0, 0
478  print("Keep gyroscope steady")
479  rospy.sleep(6)
480  for _ in range(rounds):
481  self.set_real_sensor_values()
482  self._ax, self._ay, self._az = -self._ax, -self._ay, -self._az
483  self._gx, self._gy, self._gz = -self._gx, -self._gy, -self._gz
484 
485  print(round(self._ax, 2), round(self._ay, 2), round(self._az, 2), round(self._gx, 2), round(self._gy, 2),
486  round(self._gz, 2))
487 
488  gxcal += self._gx
489  gycal += self._gy
490  gzcal += self._gz
491  axcal += self._ax
492  aycal += self._ay
493  azcal += self._az - 1
494 
495  rospy.sleep(.05)
496 
497  gxcal /= rounds
498  gycal /= rounds
499  gzcal /= rounds
500  axcal /= rounds
501  aycal /= rounds
502  azcal /= rounds
503 
504  with open(self.config_path, 'r') as f:
505  conf = yaml.safe_load(f)
506 
507  conf["Gyroscope"]["gxoffset"] = gxcal
508  conf["Gyroscope"]["gzoffset"] = gycal
509  conf["Gyroscope"]["gyoffset"] = gzcal
510  conf["Accelerometer"]["axoffset"] = axcal
511  conf["Accelerometer"]["ayoffset"] = aycal
512  conf["Accelerometer"]["azoffset"] = azcal
513 
514  with open(self.config_path, 'w') as f:
515  yaml.dump(conf, f, default_flow_style=False)
516 
517  def configure_system(self):
518  """
519  System setup
520  """
521  self.__calibrate_magnetometer(600)
522  self.__calibrate_gyroscope_and_accelerometer(600)
523  # self.__compute_std(1000)
524  # with open(self.config_path, 'w+') as config_params:
525  # self.configparser.write(config_params)
526 
527 
528 
529 if __name__ == '__main__':
530  try:
531  bus = smbus.SMBus(1)
532  sys = InertialNavigationSystem()
533  sys.startup_sensors([MPU6050(bus), QMC5883(bus)])
534  sys.configure_system()
535  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
536  pass
